snippet: The information technology sector, which once disdained paying dividends to shareholders, now pays more dividends than any other sector in the Standard & Poor’s 500.
lead_paragraph: The information technology sector, which once disdained paying dividends to shareholders, now pays more dividends than any other sector in the Standard & Poor’s 500.

headline.seo: Off the Charts: High Tech, High Dividends
headline.main: Off the Charts: High Tech, High Dividends
